author: Ryan Daws
description:
In a move that has already drawn fire from industry critics, Google has overhauled its Play Store developer fees and rules in the EEA (European Economic Area). The changes, announced as part of the company’s ongoing efforts to comply with the EU’s Digital Markets Act, introduce a complex new fee structure and offer developers more […]

The post Google alters Play Store developer fees and rules in the EEA appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Google alters Play Store developer fees and rules in the EEA
